readable.title: 3213992947_3f3f967a9f
readable.content: A girl in a red jacket , surrounded by people . A woman in a puffy red jacket poses for a picture at an ice skating rink . A woman in a red coat is smiling , while people in the background are walking around in winter clothing . A woman wearing a red coat smiles down at the camera . The woman in a red jacket is smiling at the camera .
